page.title: 14MORE WORDS WE USE
page.content:
Here are some more of our special words. {VERBS {chaff}- steal {chorey}- steal {nash}- hurry{ scran}- scrounge {spinning}- joking {stoorie}- hurry {yop}- betray {yuck}- throw
This is how we use them in sentences.
The thief waited for a chance to{chaff the money. He tried to{chorey}my pencil. She was told to{nash}to the shops. The beggar had to{scran}for food. He was{spinning}when he said he was ill. My brother had to{stoorie}to the shops before they closed. I was going to{yop}on the boy who broke the window. In winter we{yuck}snowballs.
